title: Problems: Green's Theorem Applications
description: Answer all questions. Each carries 1 mark. Choose the most appropriate option.

questions.title:
Use Green's Theorem to evaluate
$$
\int_{C} 2xy\,dx + (x + y)\,dy,
$$
where $C$ is the boundary of the region between $y = 0$ and $y = 1 - x^2$.

Use Green's Theorem to evaluate
$$
\int_C (x^2 - y^2)\,dx + 2xy\,dy.
$$

Use Green's Theorem to evaluate
$$
\int_C e^{x}\cos(2y)\,dx - 2e^{x}\sin(2y)\,dy,
$$
where $C$ is the circle $x^2 + y^2 = a^2$.

Use Green's Theorem to evaluate
$$
\int_C \cos y\,dx + (xy - x\sin y)\,dy,
$$
where $C$ is the boundary between $y = x$ and $y = \sqrt{x}$.

Use Green's Theorem to evaluate
$$
\int_C (x - 3y)\,dx + (x + y)\,dy,
$$
where $C$ is the region between $x^2 + y^2 = 1$ and $x^2 + y^2 = 9$.
